overview: On a huge cold field of snow, a huge blue monster is patrolling around, making sure no structures are constructed on this very field. But a small clueless character; The Fool, has recently completed their new home on the field, having no clue about the harsh rules of this land. They have no idea about the existence of the patrolling monster. They will now have to meet the awful beast, "Destructor", and experience his need for constant destruction.
title: Constant Destruction
